alert.note: Alert for Houston; Madison (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 14 at 9:02PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Houston and northeastern Madison Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 901 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Elkhart to 11 miles northeast of Madisonville. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crockett, Austonio, Grapeland, Lovelady, Latexo and Weches. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southeastern Texas.
